Address | blank1_info_sec2 = | website = | footnotes = }} is a city in the Kansai region of Japan on the island of Honshu. It is the capital city of Wakayama Prefecture.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Wakayama" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 1025; "Kansai" at p. 477. It has been recognized as a core city since 1997.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research, Vol. 2011 (2011), p. 8 [PDF 8 of 14]. Retrieved 2012-12-5. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Wakayama City Tourist Association * Waiker's Guide Map to Wakayama * Category:Cities in Wakayama Prefecture
